boardgame.name: Fireteam Zero
boardgame.description: In 1942, four soldiers vanished from the training program of the newly formed First Ranger Battalion, their names stricken from the roster. Chosen for their unique skills, they would fight in secret against terrifying supernatural enemies and overwhelming odds. This is their story._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Fireteam Zero is a cooperative game for up to four players who must cut a path through an endless swarm of deadly monsters in order to discover and defeat the ultimate evil behind them. Each player possesses a set of brutal combat skills that are represented by a deck of cards unique to that character. Play cards to devastate the creatures in your way, help your teammates survive the onslaught, or even reshape the tactical landscape with the proper application of explosive ordinance. The battle is fought across three maps of increasing difficulty, each one bringing more and tougher enemies than the last. Players must search for and complete mission objectives in order to progress and bring them one step closer to the final showdown._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Aiding them are two NPC Specialists, one with an uncanny ability to sense the location and nature of the supernatural energy in the area and another with an encyclopedic knowledge of the arcane. Use the Specialists wisely or risk failure no matter how many monsters you defeat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Race against time as the creatures on the board become stronger and more cunning. The longer you take to complete your objectives, the more Monster Twist cards are revealed, each granting a new and terrible aspect to your enemy. In each set of missions you will face a different family of horrifying creatures, each with their own special abilities and twist cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players must not only fight for their lives, but at the same time they must make smart tactical choices with their teammates in order to make the best use of a limited resource, the cards in their hands. Each card not only represents an action that they can take, but also their health. Spending too many cards can leave you vulnerable, while spending too few can result in being overwhelmed. Clever players will rely on each other to succeed._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Fireteam Zero is a story-rich board game of squad tactics and horror. Each map can be played separately in about 45 minutes or together to complete an entire Operation in about three hours._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expansions:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1) The Africa Cycle:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Go head to head against the Thornspawn in this expansion!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;New Miniatures! Receive the Thornspawn, an entire new monster family. Comes with 8 Scavengers, 3 Wooden Men, and Prime who is a massive 60mm tall boss figure._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;New Mechanic! Add Gear to your hero as you progress. Gear can be easily added to the core set and all other expansions as well._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;New Locations and Adventures! You'll encounter:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;An all new, 3 Act Operation: Sticks and Bones. Plus, these standalone missions:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Lost and Found_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Clockwork _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Between the Bones of the Earth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;And you'll face these challenges using 4 new double-side map tiles, giving you 8 new map sectors with all new terrain to explore!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2) The Europe Cycle:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Face the Bloodless in the Old Country!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;New Miniatures! Receive the Bloodless, another entirely new monster family! Comes with 8 Spore Children, 3 Saprophyte Soldiers, and Black Tooth, a towering boss figure over 60mm tall!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;New Mechanic! Enhance your Specialists with all new powers! Each specialist now receives their own deck, unleashing fantastic new abilities. The Specialist decks have been designed to work seamlessly with the core set and all other expansions!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;New Locations and Adventures! An all new 3 Act Operation: The Dead of Winter. Plus, these standalone missions:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Artifact Vault Bravo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Hunt_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Sacrifice of Honor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Conquer your enemies on 4 new double-side map tiles, giving you 8 new map sectors with all new terrain!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: ***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER**** Game is expected to ship in late December, 2015. This is for the War Chest pledge level, which is the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;all-in_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; pledge level. This includes: * The core game * The Africa Expansion * The Europe Expansion * Fireteam Echo Male Hero Variants * Fireteam Delta Female Hero Variants * KS Exclusive Specialist - Herc * KS Exclusive Minions - Thorn Skulk x 3 * Marrow Fetch x 3 * Lunger * Folklorist Minsk * Unique Elite - Eldrivore * Unique Elite - Artifact Wraith * Unique Elite - Eater of the Dead * Unique Elite - Daughter of Typhon * Unique Elite - Infesting Queen * Unique Elite - Whispering Fetch * Unique Elite - Flensing Tree * Unique Elite - Grim Imposter * Unique Boss - Aether Husk * Unique Boss - Commander Geitz * Set of 12 Plastic Spawn Points * Team Challenge Pack * Team Competition Pack * Mission Generator Pack * Multi-Squad Location Pack - Red Sands * Multi-Squad Location Pack - Stalag V * Extra Set of Dice * Extra Set of Hero Decks and Focus Cards * All Five Monster Family Packs * Official Soundtrack * Fighting Zeroes Hero Upgrade Pack * Lonely Guns Hero Upgrade Pack * Spawn of the Infernal Twist Pack * Sleepless in Shadows Twist Pack * And all Stretch Goals! As you can imagine, this is likely to be very heavy. Expect at least 12 pounds, and maybe a lot more. Shipping will be calculated when the game arrives. The most likely option to keep costs down is Fedex or UPS Ground. Please contact me if you have any questions.

This is for the KS Recruit plus pledge. This is a preorder and I can update shipping to mail directly to you if purchased soon, shipping is expected to start soonish, according to updates it is getting packed onto a boat soon. If it is too late to update the address I will ship to you at cost. It is for the core set, plus the following: * Official Soundtrack * KS Exclusive Specialist - Herc * KS Exclusive Minions - Thorn Skulk x 3 * Marrow Fetch x 3 * Lunger * Folklorist Minsk * Fighting Zeroes Hero Upgrade Pack * Lonely Guns Hero Upgrade Pack * Spawn of the Infernal Twist Pack * Sleepless in Shadows Twist Pack And all Stretch Goals! (see the KS page for the stretch goals: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/701653685/fireteam-zero-0/description) Also I added on Fireteam Delta the all female fireteam.

I got the $145 Heavy Assault with all KS exclusives, plus all of the add-on monster models shown in the brown add-on sections, plus the team challenge pack and the mission generator pack. Add that up and it comes to $255, my pledge. Here is the link: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/701653685/fireteam-zero-a-game-of-tactics-horror-and-cool-mi/description The base game has been lightly played; the rest is yet to be released but should be on its way this summmer, according to the last update. The base game has been lightly played, but kept in a smoke-free home. The expansions are yet to be released and will be shipped unopened. The base game will be shipped immediately for FREE, and the expansions will be delivered directly to you when released, because I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll change the shipping info on my Kickstarter pledge manager once payment is received, and you will be copied on the transaction. Let me know if you have any other questions.

It was opened once to check to contents, otherwise it is as new. Included are all miniatures of the kickstarter (183 minis in 55 sculpts). There is one more tray of monsters not shown in the pictures Im shipping worldwide from Germany. Ask for prices Please let me know what it is worth to you. There are not many of these on the market and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m willing to make a fair deal considerably cheaper than whats on ebay.

I have the Kickstarter edition (War Chest Level) plus all addons which are all unopened. This includes - The Core Game - The Africa Cycle - The Europe Cycle - Kickstarter Exclusives (Multi Squad Locations, Male and Female Hero Packs and Herc Figure) - All Stretch Goals - 5 Complete Monster Family Set - Extra Dice - Extra Hero Decks - 10 Unique Elite Boss Figures and Cards - Plastic Spawn Points - 3 Additional Mission Packs Plus Mercs and all items I am happy to negotiate on prices and bundling other games I have for sale. I am happy to ship anywhere in the world at the buyers cost. Happy to take payments via Paypal or via EFT Transfer to my bank account. If you have any questions please message me, I am also happy to send photos on request

This listing is for the first Kickstarter Rectruit+ pledge level. Used. Includes the core game PLUS: x4 Marrow Fetches x4 Malignant Vermin x4 Maggot Hounds x2 Corrupted Soldiers x2 Lungers x1 Exhumed Fetch x1 The Mangled x1 Folklorist Minsk x1 Herc x4 Thorn Skulls x1 Splinter Fiend x1 Start Player Marker x2 Escalation Packs (one opened and used, the other_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s cards are still in wrapper) BONUS: x1 Mission generator pack ($18 add-on in the KS) Game components are in very good condition. Condition reduced due to some packaging materials: the box has a quarter sized hole in the back from a prior shipment, not noticeable from the interior due to the insert and game components are still protected. The mission generator pack deck box was packed tight with cards, and I tore the top of the deck box a small amount when I was trying to open it. The escalation pack cards are still in the plastic wrapping. I discarded the (ridiculously oversized) stretch goal box and some of the garbage plastic inserts which were taking up space. All items are packed in the core box. Buyer pays $30 shipping or the actual cost, whichever is cheaper.
Played once, otherwise excellent condition. Ship to UK only
